name: Jasprit Bumrah
strategies: New ball: hard length then fuller nip-backer. Death: yorker > bouncer > wide yorker; bowl to one side.

name: Mohammed Shami
strategies: Test/ODI: top of off with wobble seam; attack pads fuller after bumper.

name: Mohammed Siraj
strategies: 4th-stump pressure; surprise bumper; fuller nip-backer.

name: Ravichandran Ashwin
strategies: Outside-off channel to RHB; to LHB target pad with drift.

name: Kuldeep Yadav

name: Bhuvneshwar Kumar

name: Ravi Bishnoi

name: Will Jacks
strategies: PP: darted off-spin on off stump with protection on leg side; Middle: wider off-spin, change pace & loop to force aerial shots; Death: quicker, flatter at stumps or wide outside off to restrict big hits

name: Mitchell Santner
strategies: PP: darted deliveries on off/middle stump, fielders in ring to cut singles; Middle: use flight & angle into right-handers, wide line to left-handers, mix in arm ball; Death: flat darts wide outside off or at stumps, force batter to hit across the line
